trans-unit.target: 从过滤器中返回一个非空值,将有效地使URL猜测短路,而返回传递的值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a non-null value from the filter will effectively short-circuit the function and return the value of the ‘global_terms_enabled’ site option instead.
trans-unit.target: 从过滤器返回非空值将有效地使函数短路，并返回“ global_terms_enabled”站点选项的值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a non-null value from the filter will short-circuit wp_nav_menu(), echoing that value if $args->echo is true, returning that value otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 从过滤器返回非空值将使wp_nav_menu（）短路，如果$ args-> echo为true，则回显该值，否则返回该值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a non-null value to the filter will short-circuit wp_nav_menu(), echoing that value if $args->echo is true, returning that value otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 向过滤器返回非空值将使wp_nav_menu（）短路，如果$ args-> echo为true，则回显该值，否则返回该值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a non-null value will effectively short-circuit and avoid a potentially expensive query against postmeta.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个非空值将有效地短路,避免对postmeta进行昂贵的查询。

trans-unit.source: Returning a non-null value will effectively short-circuit the function, returning that value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个非空值将有效地使函数短路,返回该值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a non-null value will short-circuit adding the event to the cron array, causing the function to return the filtered value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个非空值会使添加事件到cron数组的过程短路,导致函数返回过滤后的值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a non-null value will short-circuit the normal process, returning the filtered value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个非空值会使正常过程短路,返回过滤后的值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a non-null value will short-circuit the normal rescheduling process, causing the function to return the filtered value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个非空值会使正常的重排过程短路,导致函数返回过滤后的值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a non-null value will short-circuit the normal unscheduling process, causing the function to return the filtered value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个非空值会使正常的解调过程短路,导致函数返回过滤后的值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a non-null value will short-circuit the save method, returning that value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个非空值会使保存方法短路,返回该值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a non-null value will short-circuit the unique slug generation, returning the passed value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个非空值会使唯一的slug生成短路,返回传递的值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a positive integer will effectively short-circuit the function.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个正整数将有效地使函数短路。

trans-unit.source: Returning a truthy value from the filter will effectively short-circuit down-sizing the image, returning that value instead.
trans-unit.target: 从滤镜中返回一个truthhy值,将有效地短路缩小图像,而返回该值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a truthy value from the filter will effectively short-circuit retrieval and return the passed value instead.
trans-unit.target: 从过滤器中返回一个truthhy值将有效地短路检索并返回传递的值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a truthy value from the filter will effectively short-circuit the new post being inserted and return 0. If $wp_error is true, a WP_Error will be returned instead.
trans-unit.target: 从过滤器返回真实值将有效地使新插入的帖子短路并返回0。如果$ wp_error为true，则将返回WP_Error。

trans-unit.source: Returning a truthy value from the filter will effectively short-circuit the shortlink generation process, returning that value instead.
trans-unit.target: 从过滤器中返回一个truthhy值将有效地短路短链生成过程,而返回该值。

trans-unit.source: Returning a truthy value from the filter will redirect only exact post_name matches.
trans-unit.target: 从过滤器中返回truthy值将只重定向与post_name完全匹配的内容。

trans-unit.source: Returning a truthy value from the filter will skip the current meta object from being exported.
trans-unit.target: 从过滤器中返回truthy值将跳过当前的元对象,使其不被导出。

trans-unit.source: Returning a truthy value to the filter will effectively short-circuit the new post being inserted, returning 0. If $wp_error is true, a WP_Error will be returned instead.
trans-unit.target: 向过滤器返回真实值将有效地使插入的新帖子短路，返回0。如果$ wp_error为true，则将返回WP_Error。

trans-unit.source: Returning a truthy value to the filter will skip the current meta object from being exported.
trans-unit.target: 向过滤器返回truthy值将跳过当前的元对象,使其不被导出。

trans-unit.source: Returning a truthy value, or one that could be evaluated as a WP_Error will effectively short-circuit the installation, returning that value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回truthy值，或一个可以作为一个被评估WP_Error将有效地短路的安装，返回该值来代替。

trans-unit.source: Returning a value of false will effectively short-circuit setting the current user.
trans-unit.target: 返回false值将有效地对当前用户进行短路设置。

trans-unit.source: Returning an array from the filter will effectively short-circuit retrieval from the filesystem and return the passed value instead.
trans-unit.target: 从过滤器中返回一个数组将有效地短路从文件系统中检索并返回传递的值。

trans-unit.source: Returning an array will short-circuit the normal retrieval of ready cron jobs, causing the function to return the filtered value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组会短路正常检索准备好的cron作业,导致函数返回过滤后的值。

trans-unit.source: Returning any other value may result in unexpected behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 返回任何其他值都可能导致意外的行为。

trans-unit.source: Returning anything else than true will not add the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 返回 true 以外的任何东西都不会添加属性。

trans-unit.source: Returning anything other than an empty string will effectively short-circuit output of the filesystem credentials form, returning that value instead.
trans-unit.target: 返回除空字符串以外的任何内容都会有效地短路文件系统凭证表单的输出,而返回该值。

trans-unit.source: Returning false disables the welcome email.
trans-unit.target: 返回 "false "则会禁用欢迎邮件。

trans-unit.source: Returning false effectively short-circuits display of the control form.
trans-unit.target: 返回false有效地使控制表格的显示短路。

trans-unit.source: Returning false from the filter will disable the ability to override the post lock.
trans-unit.target: 从过滤器中返回false将禁用覆盖职位锁定的功能。

trans-unit.source: Returning false from the filter will effectively short-circuit wptexturize() and return the original text passed to the function instead.
trans-unit.target: 从过滤器返回false将有效地缩短wptexturize（）并返回传递给该函数的原始文本。

trans-unit.source: Returning false from the filter will prevent the dialog from being displayed.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器返回false将阻止对话框的显示。

trans-unit.source: Returning false from the filter will skip saving the current option.
trans-unit.target: 从过滤器中返回false将跳过保存当前选项。

trans-unit.source: Returning false to the filter will skip saving the current option.
trans-unit.target: 对过滤器返回false将跳过保存当前选项。

trans-unit.source: Returning false to this filter will cancel the redirect.
trans-unit.target: 对该过滤器返回false将取消重定向。

trans-unit.source: Returning false to this hook is the recommended way to hide the admin bar. The user’s display preference is used for logged in users.
trans-unit.target: 将false返回此钩子是隐藏管理栏的推荐方法。用户的显示首选项用于登录的用户。

trans-unit.source: Returning false will bypass the proxy; returning true will send the request through the proxy. Returning null bypasses the filter.
trans-unit.target: 返回false将绕过代理,返回true将通过代理发送请求。返回null将绕过过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Returning false will effectively short-circuit display of the widget.
trans-unit.target: 返回 false 将有效地使小组件的显示短路。

trans-unit.source: Returning false will effectively short-circuit the widget’s ability to update settings.
trans-unit.target: 返回false将有效地缩短窗口小部件更新设置的能力。

trans-unit.source: Returning false will trigger a PHP version warning to show up in the admin dashboard to administrators.
trans-unit.target: 返回false将触发PHP版本警告,显示在管理员仪表板上。

trans-unit.source: Saving hex colors without a hash puts the burden of adding the hash on the UI, which makes it difficult to use or upgrade to other color types such as rgba, hsl, rgb, and html color names.
trans-unit.target: 在没有哈希值的情况下保存十六进制颜色,会给UI带来添加哈希值的负担,这样就很难使用或升级到其他颜色类型,如rgba、hsl、rgb和html颜色名称。

trans-unit.source: Search Parameters
trans-unit.target: 搜索参数

trans-unit.source: Search all registered theme directories for complete and valid themes.
trans-unit.target: 搜索所有注册的主题目录,为完整和有效的主题。

trans-unit.source: Search and retrieve blocks metadata
trans-unit.target: 搜索和检索块元数据

trans-unit.source: Search content for shortcodes and filter shortcodes through their hooks.
trans-unit.target: 搜索内容的快捷码,并通过其钩子过滤快捷码。

trans-unit.source: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after.
trans-unit.target: 搜索标准来匹配术语。将采用SQL格式,前后都有通配符。

trans-unit.source: Search engines consider www.somedomain.com and somedomain.com to be two different URLs when they both go to the same location. This SEO enhancement prevents penalty for duplicate content by redirecting all incoming links to one or the other.
trans-unit.target: 搜索引擎认为www.somedomain.com和somedomain.com是两个不同的URL,当他们都去同一个位置。这种SEO改进通过将所有传入的链接重定向到一个或另一个来防止重复内容的惩罚。

trans-unit.source: Search for disabled element tags. Push element to stack on tag open and pop on tag close.
trans-unit.target: 搜索禁用元素标签。标签打开时推送元素到堆栈,标签关闭时弹出。

trans-unit.source: Search keyword(s). Prepending a term with a hyphen will exclude posts matching that term. Eg, 'pillow -sofa' will return posts containing 'pillow' but not 'sofa'. The character used for exclusion can be modified using the the 'wp_query_search_exclusion_prefix' filter.
trans-unit.target: 搜索关键词。在词前加上连字符将排除与该词匹配的帖子。例如,'pillow -sofa'将返回包含'pillow'但不包含'sofa'的帖子。用于排除的字符可以使用'wp_query_search_exclusion_prefix'过滤器来修改。

trans-unit.source: Search keyword. Searches for possible string matches on columns. When $search_columns is left empty, it tries to determine which column to search in based on search string.
trans-unit.target: 搜索关键字。在列上搜索可能的字符串匹配。当 $search_columns 保留为空时，它将尝试根据搜索字符串确定要搜索的列。

trans-unit.source: Search only inside HTML elements for shortcodes and process them.
trans-unit.target: 只在HTML元素内部搜索快捷码并进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Search term(s) to retrieve matching comments for.
trans-unit.target: 搜索术语以检索匹配的评论。

trans-unit.source: Search term(s) to retrieve matching networks for.
trans-unit.target: 检索匹配网络的搜索词。

trans-unit.source: Search term(s) to retrieve matching sites for.
trans-unit.target: 搜索术语,以检索匹配的网站。

trans-unit.source: Search terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after and searched in 'link_url', 'link_name' and 'link_description'.
trans-unit.target: 搜索条件。将采用SQL格式,前后加通配符,以'link_url'、'link_name'和'link_description'进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: Search users.
trans-unit.target: 搜索用户。

trans-unit.source: Searches all registered theme directories for complete and valid themes.
trans-unit.target: 搜索所有注册的主题目录,搜索完整有效的主题。

trans-unit.source: Searches for HTML tags, no matter how malformed.
trans-unit.target: 搜索HTML标签,无论多么畸形。

trans-unit.source: Searches for all of the links, strips them out of the content, and places them at the bottom of the content with numbers.
trans-unit.target: 搜索所有的链接,把它们从内容中剥离出来,用数字放在内容的底部。

trans-unit.source: Searches for metadata in the first 8 KB of a file, such as a plugin or theme. Each piece of metadata must be on its own line. Fields can not span multiple lines, the value will get cut at the end of the first line.
trans-unit.target: 搜索文件前8KB的元数据,如插件或主题。每条元数据必须在自己的行中。字段不能跨越多行,值会在第一行末尾被切掉。

trans-unit.source: Searches for metadata in the first 8kiB of a file, such as a plugin or theme. Each piece of metadata must be on its own line. Fields can not span multiple lines, the value will get cut at the end of the first line.
trans-unit.target: 在文件的前8kiB中搜索元数据,如插件或主题。每条元数据必须在自己的行中。字段不能跨越多行,值会在第一行末尾被切掉。

trans-unit.source: Searches in the STYLESHEETPATH before TEMPLATEPATH and wp-includes/theme-compat so that themes which inherit from a parent theme can just overload one file.
trans-unit.target: 在TEMPLATEPATH和wp-includes/theme-compat之前的STYLESHEETPATH中进行搜索,这样从父主题继承的主题可以只重载一个文件。

trans-unit.source: Searches in the stylesheet directory before the template directory so themes which inherit from a parent theme can just override one file.
trans-unit.target: 在模板目录前搜索样式表目录,所以从父主题继承的主题可以覆盖一个文件。

trans-unit.source: Searches the object type content for a given search request.
trans-unit.target: 搜索给定搜索请求的对象类型内容。

trans-unit.source: Searches up the list of functions until it reaches the one that would most logically had called this method.
trans-unit.target: 向上搜索函数列表,直到找到最符合逻辑地调用该方法的函数。

trans-unit.source: Second of the minute. Accepts numbers 0-60.
trans-unit.target: 分秒必争。接受数字0-60。

trans-unit.source: Secondary Loops
trans-unit.target: 二次回路

trans-unit.source: Secondly, across various PHP versions, schemeless URLs starting containing a ":" in the query are being handled inconsistently. This function works around those differences as well.
trans-unit.target: 其次,在不同的PHP版本中,查询中包含":"开头的无模式URL的处理方式不一致。这个函数也能解决这些差异。

trans-unit.source: Section the control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 控件所属科室。

trans-unit.source: Section the control belongs to. Default empty.
trans-unit.target: 控件所属的部分。默认为空。

trans-unit.source: Section title.
trans-unit.target: 节标题:

trans-unit.target: 现在默认情况下以JS呈现节，请参见WP_Customize_Section :: print_template（）。
